description.english: Fulfill an old man's dying wish.

Lose a crew member to the yawning abyss.
Reach the end of the haunted house.

Get revenge on the smuggler who double-crossed you.
Find the first leading man for your movie.
Find the second leading man for your movie.
Help the aspiring director shoot his movie.
Find the old mine owner's buried treasure.
Tell the farmer to stay strong.
Attempt to destroy the other side of the world.
Complete your first job for Civitas.
Put a permanent end to the don's criminal career.
"Convince" the bar patrons to vote for your candidate.
Deliver the little boy's letter to his mother.
Realize that you've inadvertently eaten human flesh.

Help bring new life into the world.
Uncover critical data for research into the infected.
Get the villagers to swap their Holy Herb for food.
Uncover the truth behind some highly unethical research.
Acquire a recording of a miraculous song.
Leave the young girl to die alongside her friend.

description.english: Discover the secret behind the vaccine.
Display a complete lack of critical thinking skills.

description.english: Start a revolution in New Taranis.
